entities.description: Mentioned as a possible ingredient in Cockroach Clusters.

entities.name: acid pops
entities.description: A type of sweet that Fred gave to the narrator when they were seven.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: The brother who gave the narrator an Acid Pop and was later teased by Ron about taking Cockroach Clusters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is teasing Fred about taking Cockroach Clusters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is with Ron and Harry in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: A sweet shop where Ron, Hermione, and Harry buy sweets.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school that the three friends attend.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village near Hogwarts where Ron, Hermione, and Harry are shopping.

entities.name: shrieking shack
entities.description: A location mentioned as a possible destination for Ron, Hermione, and Harry.

relationships.description: Ron is teasing Fred about taking Cockroach Clusters.
Hermione visited Honeydukes with Ron and Harry.
